56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:Abu Talha and the Prophet (ﷺ) used to shield themselves with one shield. Abu Talha was a good archer, and when he threw (his arrows) the Prophet (ﷺ) would look at the target of his arrows

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمِجَنِّ وَمَنْ يَتَتَرَّسُ بِتُرْسِ صَاحِبِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The shield, and shielding oneself with the shield of his companion
